string-array.item: Kill the snake and take it to the hospital
Take a photo of the snake

resources.string: What is the emergency number?
Which of the following images respresents the CPR procedure?
How do you proceed in case of a skin burn?
Use a cream
Apply cool water
Remove the clothing
What is the optimal temeperature for a human?
What do you do in the following situation?
How is the injury caused by a bone break called?
How do you treat a fracture?
Tie the bone with a rope
Make a splint
Apply ice
How do you save a person from chocking?
Give them water
Hug them from behind and apply pressure
Thrust upward to expel air from the lungs
Submit

Image of someone applying pressure on a person\'s lungs
Image of someone treating a wound
Image of someone resuscitating a person
Image of a blacked out person with a snake near it
Image of a logo
Depending on your country, the emergency number is a 3-digit number that can be called at any time if needed. Some of them are: 911, 112, 999.
The correct image was the third, Cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) is a lifesaving technique useful in many emergencies.
Removing the clothing from the burnt area and aplying cool water are the right answers. Using a cream is wrong in this situation.
The optimal temperature for a human is 37째.
Killing the snake and taking it to the hopital is the best approach, because it will be much easier for the doctors to find a cure.
A bone break is also known as a fracture.
The correct answer was to make a splint so that the bone doesn\'t move.

The Heimlich maneuver is performed by straddling the victim from behind and bear-hugging them with your hands interlocked above their belly-button but beneath their breastbone. Thrust upward to expel air from the lungs and repeat until you are successful in clearing the object from the windpipe.
Kill the snake and take it to the hospital
Your total score is
out of 8
Well done! All of your answers are correct. Thanks for completing the quizz.
